description: DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) ignores return value by dai.transfer(alice,wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#63)
DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(alice,address(this),wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#73)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#54)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#52)

DaiEchidnaTest.mint(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#39-46) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#44)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == sub(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#64)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#65)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- thisBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#62)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#74)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#75)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#72)

Reentrancy in L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#133-146):
	External calls:
	- Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#143)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#145)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L133-L146):
	External calls:
	- [Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L143)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L145)

description:

description:
Dai.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#184-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= deadline,Dai/permit-expired) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#185)
